title: The Business, Education and Innovation that Drive the City of Atlanta Part 2
itunes:title: The Business, Education and Innovation that Drive the City of Atlanta Part 2
description:
Brad Ball, CEO at Liquid Strategies, shares his thoughts on the markets and investing in exchange traded funds with “ovals.” Paul Judge, Co-Founder of TechSquare Labs, talks about venture capital investing in Atlanta. Jay Gould, CEO at Interface, explains the commercial flooring company’s efforts to go green. Ana Tavares Lattibeaudiere, Head of North America at GSMA, talks about Tech4Girls partnering with Girl Scouts of Greater Atlanta to prepare girls for careers in STEAM (science, technology, engineering and math). Geoff Henry, President at Jamba, on rebranding the smoothie maker.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
